Jeff Shaw

Wifi Beerbong

Purely for fun project, no explaination needed. Built with particle.io, firebase, node, react. Basically the beer bong contains a flow sensor and a battery powered wifi arduino. When beer is chugged, we send a a post request with a timestamp over to our webapp. Webapp consists of leaderboard, user Id's done by facebook sdk.

https://github.com/drankadank

We short circuited everything on our first test. Luckily I had a seconded particle photon with me. Made sure our enclosure was waterproof.
